description: a(n) = n*omega(n)^n where omega(n) is the number of unrepeated prime divisors of n.
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=1,...,500
prog: (PARI) for(n=1,20,print(n*omega(n)^n))(PARI) { for (n=1, 500, write("b061340.txt", n, " ", n*omega(n)^n) ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 21 2009]
author: Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), Jun 15 2001
extensions: Removed spurious commas in several entries. _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 21 2009
